short_description: CORROSION RESISTANCE - Our 1/4 inch galvanized aircraft wire cable rope is coated in steel carbon to prevent corrosion. Originally designed for aeronautical applications, our zinc coated galvanized cable has a higher breaking strength than stainless steel cables. Breaking strength is 1,400 LBS.

WIDE RANGE OF USES - Use on winches, guy lines, zip lines, and other high tensile commercial, industrial, and marine applications. With a breaking strength of 1,400 pounds, our coated wire cable is multipurpose. While our cable is industrial strength, it is not intended for aircraft use.

7x7 CONSTRUCTION - Our 7x7 wire is made with 7 strands with 7 wires per strand construction to provide the ultimate strength. With 250 feet of plastic coated wire, you’ll have more than enough wire for any project, regardless of its size.

COTTON FIBERS - Please note that cotton strands are intertwined with the wire strands to help the life duration of the wires. The cotton helps add flexibility to the entire cable and keeps it from bending or twisting during use.
LONG LASTING HANGING LIFE - This steel rope holds your heaviest items without breaking, sinking, or coming loose. Our super-soft wire is coated in a protective vinyl jacket for better performance.

short_description: Marine-Grade Material: Crafted from premium T316 stainless steel, our wire rope boasts exceptional strength, durability, and resistance to rust and corrosion.Whether exposed to coastal humidity (marine), industrial pollutants (industrial), or backyard elements (outdoor, garden), it maintains structural integrity for decades.

With a breaking strength of 6700 pounds, the tightly wound design ensures flexibility without sacrificing ruggedness, perfect for heavy-duty tasks in industrial, house, marine, and DIY deck cable railing systems.

The surface of the steel cable is smooth, high polish, easy to cut and crimping.

Multipurpose stainless steel cable: Versatile for deck, garden, and industrial applications, this cable enhances safety in balustrades and fences with its stainless steel reliability. Ideal for deck cable railing, zip line, aircraft cable, garden fencing, hanging string lights, clothesline, shade sails, plants vines trellis, boat Lifting, and other DIY projects in your garage, patio, yard, backyard.
Easy DIY Installation: User-friendly design allows effortless cutting and assembly, saving time for homeowners and professionals in creating secure, aesthetically pleasing railings.
product_description: CELYND 1/4" Premium Stainless Steel Cable: Unbreakable Versatility for Every Challenge Marine-Grade Strength Meets Effortless Installation 1. Engineered for Extreme Environments Crafted from T316 stainless steel (marine-grade material), our cable boasts unmatched resistance to rust, saltwater, chemicals, and harsh weather. Whether exposed to coastal humidity (marine), industrial pollutants (industrial), or backyard elements (outdoor, garden), it maintains structural integrity for decades. Unlike standard steel, T316 fights corrosion relentlessly—ideal for docks, boats, and high-moisture areas. 2. Uncompromising Durability & Load Capacity Featuring a 7x19 braided construction (7 core strands × 19 wires), this cable delivers a staggering 6,700-lb breaking strength. Its tightly wound design ensures flexibility without sacrificing ruggedness—perfect for heavy-duty tasks like: Safety-critical systems: Deck railings, balustrades, and stair handrails. Dynamic loads: Ziplines, aircraft rigging, and lifting equipment. Everyday resilience: Hanging lights, clotheslines, shade sails, and vine trellises. 3. Precision Specifications for Flawless Installation Diameter: 1/4 inch (optimal balance of strength and flexibility). Length: 100 feet (ready for large projects like deck railing kits or garden fencing). Surface: Smooth, high-polish finish—easy to cut, crimp, and handle without gloves. *Why 1/4"?* It’s the industry sweet spot: thick enough for safety (railing, zipline), strong enough for DIY agility (string lights, trellis). 4. Your Ultimate Multi-Scenario Solution This cable adapts to 50+ applications, including: Home & Garden: Secure patio railings, create garden fences, hang plants, or build pergolas. Marine & Outdoor: Anchor boats, reinforce docks, or rig shade sails. Industrial: Aircraft cables, warehouse systems, and machinery safety guards. DIY Creativity: Clotheslines, hanging decor, pet enclosures, or swing sets. 5. DIY Simplicity, Professional Results Easy to Cut & Customize: Minimal tools required—cut to size with bolt cutters. Burr-Free Ends: Smooth crimping prevents injury (safety) and simplifies assembly. Time-Saving: Install deck railing kits or trellises in hours, not days. Why Choose CELYND? ✅ Trusted Performance: 6700-lb tested strength (exceeds industry standards). ✅ Corrosion Guarantee: T316 steel outlasts T304 in salty/wet environments (marine, decking). ✅ User-First Design: Flexible yet rigid where it counts—no kinking or fraying. ✅ Versatility Unmatched: From backyard ziplines (kids) to architectural railings (modern design), one cable does it all. Upgrade to Reliability—Order Now and Build with Confidence! Ideal for homeowners, contractors, and DIY enthusiasts seeking a rust-proof, heavy-duty cable that blends strength with elegance.
